name: Gener8 Ads
slogan: We enable people to monetise their own data

team.name: Sam Jones
team.bioHtml: • Founder @Gener8 Ads • Previously Global brand Manager @Red Bull

jobs.title: Social Media Specialist (Paid Internship)
jobs.description:
Introduction

Gener8 is a rapidly growing tech startup. Our core product is a browser extension that enables people to control the ads that they see and earn money from them. We're a small team based in London and have closed 4 rounds of funding to date, with investors whom include the CEO of Spotify. Having recently launched our beta we have over 10,000 daily active users and aim to grow rapidly this year. Our founder, Sam Jones, was previously a Global Brand Manager at Red Bull where he was a key figure in their world-wide advertising and responsible for one third of their global advertising.
We have an active community of users who are constantly commenting on FB / TW / Reddit and over email. 

Responsibilities
Managing and maintaining all of the social media accounts: Facebook / Instagram / Twitter / Reddit / Medium / Youtube /Linkedin.
Responsible for increasing  followers across all accounts. 
Responsible for all communication with our users both on social media and via our support email accounts as well as managing the FAQs and website blog.
Create and post content that is in line with our existing brand identity.
Create short form articles that can be posted on Medium and our website blog.
Communicate user feedback to the tech team who can use it to build new features or fix bugs.

Requirements
Have a passion for all things social media , keeping up with the latest trends.
Be a great communicator who’s able to give and take feedback constructively
Benefits
Paid Internship with the possibility of being retained full time  afterwards. 
Work alongside a talented team in a fast paced startup environment.      
Grow your experience and portfolio by working on projects that impact business success.
Barista and beer on tap, table tennis and pool in the office.
Team activities that take place every couple of months. 

Start Date:  as soon as possible 

Duration: minimum 1 month. Ideally 3 months (or until you go back to university if you are a student). Possibility to be hired full time after 3 months if you are a superstar.

Interview Process: 1. Submit CV 2. Phone call 3. Interview in office.

jobs.title: Advertising Specialist
jobs.description:
WHO WE ARE 
Gener8 is a browser extension that enables people to take control of the ads they see online and earn money from seeing them. Having launched our beta earlier this year we already have over 25,000 registered users and aim to grow to 75,000 this year.

Our overarching belief is that people should have more control over their data and be able to monetise it themselves. The Gener8 browser extension is our first product. 

We're a small team based in a WeWork office close to Liverpool Street. We’ve closed multiple funding rounds from esteemed industry investors. Our founder, Sam Jones, was previously a Global Brand Manager at Red Bull where he was a key figure in their world-wide advertising and responsible for one third of their global advertising.

ROLE SUMMARY
You will be responsible for growing and retaining our userbase. You will report directly into the Head of User Growth.
•	Create and execute FB and Google campaigns in order to drive user growth across organic and paid acquisition channels.
•	Track and report on the efficiency of campaigns. 
•	Optimise campaigns on the fly and shift marketing budget towards the most cost-effective channels. 
•	Understand who our existing users are and gain insights from GA, first party data and heatmapping about how they use our product and how we can improve their user journey. 
•	Manage social media accounts and grow the organic following. 
Your time split on an average week will look like: 
60% Facebook strategy and paid advertising execution, including briefing creative; 
20% Google PPC and Display; 
10% Researching and testing new or emerging channels, Twitch, TikTok, etc.
10% Community management of existing users.
EXPERIENCE 
In addition to having a solid experience of all criteria listed in the ‘role summary’ the ideal candidate will:
•	Have run performance marketing campaigns (cost per install, rather than brand campaigns).  
•	Be confident creating and executing full funnel strategy and competent analysing the results. 
•	Likely to come from an agency background (1-2yrs experience), or have experience of working in a role that drives app installs (or similar performance focus).

QUALITIES 
•	Digital mindset, deep curiosity and knowledge of content marketing and communication. 
•	A self-starter who is entrepreneurial able to work independently and manage expectations.
•	High performer with a solid work ethic who enjoys a fast paced ‘start-up culture’.
•	Have a “test, learn and optimise” mindset. 

BENEFITS 
•	£27-37k salary. 
•	Share Options in the company.
•	Joining and contributing to a rapidly growing company in the early stages of growth.  
•	Budget for professional learning and development opportunities.
•	25 days annual holiday.
•	Regular team activities.
•	Vibrant office environment, with barista, beer on tap, table tennis and pool table.

INTERVIEW PROCESS:
1. phone screen; 2. Complete case study; 3. face to face interview.
